name: dataset_id
description: dataset identifier (normalized URI, that is: "/" replaced with "_")

name: record_id
description: Unique identifier for each record in a dataset (sequence from 1 to n)

name: reference
description: The data source (in data compilations for meta analysis)

name: DAP
description: Days after planting (relative time scale used in some crop experiments

name: DAE
description: Days after emergece (relative time scale used in some crop experiments)
